Environmentalists, meanwhile, gripe that junk mail requires some 4 million tons of paper, nearly half of which lands in the trash unopened.Valdez had come face to face with a phenomenon that industry critics have been griping about for years."Florida ain't ranked in the Top 25, and they're on TV every Saturday," he gripes.
